display_name: The Chronic Sleep Reduction Questionnaire: Total score
description:
Calculated - Individual items have an ordinal three-point response scale (1 to 3), and form a total CSRQ total score ranging from 20 to 60. Higher scores suggest more severe chronic sleep reduction. [Meijer A. M. (2008).(PMID: 19021856)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19021856/)

[Search for all CSRQ variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/nfs/variables?search=csrq)
